fields.label: Certification region
fields.hint: Select the region in which the certification will take place:
fields.name: certification_place

content.paragraph: If you are the exporter, provide your name or business name. If you are an agent representing someone else, provide their name or business name.

title: What is the origin of the product?

content.header: What is the origin of the product?
content.paragraph: Provide details of the origin of the animals from which the product is derived. These may originate from more than one region. We use this information to help control the spread of disease.

fields.label: Commodity code
fields.hint: You can use the trade tariff search on GOV.UK to find this. This code is between 4 and 10 digits, for example 0308305000
fields.name: commodity_code

fields.label: Production area for frozen or processed bivalve molluscs
fields.hint: For example, Loch Fyne. If not applicable, leave blank.
fields.name: commodity_production_area

fields.label: Net and gross weight of consignment
fields.hint: Provide the number and the units of measurement. For example, 500 kg (528 kg)
fields.name: commodity_weight

title: What are the details of the product?

content.header: What are the details of the product?
content.caption: What are the details of the product? 1 of 5
content.paragraph: Provide details of the products in this consignment. Use a new record for each product. If there are more than 5 products, attach a schedule as a supporting document at the end of this application. When you have finished, select 'Save and review'.

fields.label: Approval number of the manufacturing plant
fields.hint: This may be a factory vessel, freezer vessel, cold store or processing plant
fields.name: product_number

fields.label: Net and gross weight of consignment
fields.hint: Provide the number and the units of measurement. For example, 500 kg (528 kg)
fields.name: commodity_weight

fields.label: Net and gross weight of consignment
fields.hint: Provide the number and the units of measurement. For example, 500 kg (528 kg)
fields.name: product_nature

title: What is the place of origin of the consignment?

content.header: What is the place of origin of the consignment?
content.paragraph: Provide details of the name and address of the dispatch establishment.
Enter the person or organisation responsible for the consignment arriving at its destination, for example the exporter or the agent.

title: How will the consignment be packaged?

content.header: How will the consignment be packaged?
content.paragraph: Enter the person or organisation responsible for the consignment arriving at its destination, for example the exporter or the agent.

fields.label: Total number of packages in the consignment
fields.name: packaged_name

fields.label: Type of packaging
fields.hint: For example Box, Carton, Crate etc.
fields.name: packaged_tel

title: Where will the consignment be loaded?

content.header: Where will the consignment be loaded?
content.paragraph: Provide details of where the consignment will be loaded. This may be the same as the place of origin.

fields.label: Place of loading
fields.hint: Provide the name and location of the establishment
fields.name: loading_location

title: How will the consignment be transported?

content.header: How will the consignment be transported?

fields.label: Expected date of departure from the UK
fields.name: transported_date

fields.label: Means of transport to the BIP
fields.name: transported_method

fields.label: Identification of the transport
fields.hint: Provide the flight number, the ship name or vehicle registration number(s)
fields.name: transported_id

fields.label: Documentary reference number for the transport
fields.hint: For example, number of  the airline bill or bill of lading
fields.name: transported_reference

fields.label: Container and seal numbers (optional)
fields.hint: If this is not known at the time of application, leave blank
fields.name: transported_seal

content.paragraph: Provide details of the person  the consignment will be shipped to, or their representative.

title: What is the final destination of this consignment?

content.header: What is the final destination of this consignment?

fields.label: ISO code of destination country
fields.hint: This is the 2 digit code according to the ISO 3166 standard. For example, FR, DE, etc
fields.name: Consignee_address

title: Which Border Inspection Post (BIP) will the consignment arrive at?

content.header: What is the final destination of this consignment?
content.paragraph: Consignments exported into the EU need to be inspected at a border inspection post, this is likely to be the same location as the first port of entry.

fields.label: BIP unit number
fields.hint: You can find this on the European Commission's approved list of BIPs
fields.name: BIP_number
